description: The use of exotic ingredients gives this&nbsp;Scotch cocktail a taste that is unlike any other. Bärenjäger, a German honey liqueur, gives the drink a nice, sweet, botanical flavor that is only made even better by the addition of scotch and Fernet-Branca. To top it off, the tangerine juice adds a fruity sweet and sour taste, while an egg gives it its thick and frothy texture.
name: Bee Sting
